nodes.text: The Luxury 3000 space yacht, also known as the SoroSuub 3000 or Personal Luxury Yacht 3000, was, as its name implied, a luxurious transport ship manufactured by SoroSuub Corporation. Before the Clone Wars, they were typically associated with diplomats for meetings and travel. They quickly fell out of favor as the war began as they were seen as targets for pirates and Separatists. During the Clone Wars, they were concealed with weapons to better protect themselves against Separatist attacks. Pirate captain Hondo Ohnaka piloted a Luxury 3000 space yacht dubbed Fortune and Glory.
